import React from 'react' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import './nav.css' function NAV() { const abc = useSelector(state => state.cart.quantity) const cartconatiner={ position:'relative' } const badge={ position: 'absolute', fontSize: '10px', fontWeight: '900', color: 'white', top: '-7px', right: '-9px', background: '#0062cc', border: '1px solid blue', borderRadius: '15px', width: '15px' }; function gettingcartno() { if(localStorage.getItem('products')){ var l = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('products')).length; return l; } return 0; } var cartno= gettingcartno() return (
Shop

) } export default NAV
